Sentence: Brody is also in possession of the negatives and prints of the scandalous pictures of Carmen Sternwood--pictures he (Geiger) uses to bribe Carmen's sister, Vivian, for money

Everything comes to an end when Marlowe returns Carmen Sternwood's gun--the gun Carmen had used to try to persuade Brody to return her (Carmen) pictures to her (Carmen)--to her (Carmen), and Carmen asks Marlow to teach her (Carmen) to shoot
